Summary Note:
The RM first met Van den Berg Spaans Visser at a wine tasting event in Amsterdam. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
Van den Berg Spaans Visser is a 58 year old Private Equity Investor from Netherlands.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Van den Berg Spaans Visser has been happily married to Carlijn since 2002. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
In 1986, Van den Berg finished his secondary school education at Pieter Nieuwland College Utrecht.
Van den Berg earned his degree from University of Amsterdam in 1991.
Occupation History:
Van den Berg Spaans Visser is a 58 year old and comes from Netherlands.
In 1990, Van den Berg Spaans Visser started working as a Investment Banker at Rabobank Group, marking the beginning of his successful career.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Private Equity Investor at SNS Bank N.V. in 1992, further expanding his skill set.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 760000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Venlo, Hoofddorp and Maastricht, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited 3060000 EUR from his father, a well-known Investment Banker, in 2014, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: In conclusion, we are confident in the client's financial stability and future prospects.
